posts.post_content:
I have the following card for trade. If interested, please feel free to send me a PM.

While the F stamps are said to have been owned by F. Scott Fitzgerald during his younger years, I personally have never been able to find anything whatsoever that can be considered proof of the provenance.

I am looking for HOF in lower condition, just no beaters please. 

I already have: Flick, E. Collins, Johnson - portrait, Crawford - batting, McGraw - portrait; no cap

Thank you very much.

Derek
